messages.content: Write 3-5 brief success stories or testimonials from users who have benefited from [project name], showing real-world impact.

usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """Write 3-5 brief success stories or testimonials from users who have benefited from [project name], s..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
